ygData.subject: Re: Fwd: How many lutes do they have in Kelethin an yways?
ygData.msgSnippet: But how many times can you do it?  I did it the first time and then hailed the guildmaster again.  She mentioned the same quest.  I collected 4 more spider
ygData.messageBody:
But how many times can you do it? I did it the first time and then hailed
the guildmaster again. She mentioned the same quest. I collected 4 more
spider silks but didn't notice getting any rewards the second time around.
That leads me to believe you can only do it once.

Galtin
Bard of Kelethin
E'ci

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Jason_Sanderson@... [SMTP:Jason_Sanderson@...]
> Sent: Monday, April 19, 1999 9:21 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Re: Fwd: How many lutes do they have in Kelethin
> anyways?
>
> From: Jason_Sanderson@...
>
> The quest, while boring, is lucrative. You trade in 4 spider silks, which
> can be purchased for about 1 GP total, and you trade it in for 3 GP
> (selling drum of course) and change plus XP.. I always make it a point
> to buy out every spider silk I find in stores plus kill every spider i
> find. It does take up a lot of space in your packs but when you have a
> few
> backpacks it makes it worth it..
>
> A very sticky Reed..
>
>
>
>
>
> "Catherine M. Campbell" <cathyc@...> on 04/19/99 02:55:50 PM
>
> Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> cc: (bcc: Jason Sanderson/HQ/JDS FITEL Inc)
> Subject: [eqbards] Fwd: How many lutes do they have in Kelethin anyways?
>
>
>
>
> From: "Catherine M. Campbell" <cathyc@...>
>
> Greetings all, I am the wood-elf Kendrin, bard of the 4th rank, in
> Kelethin.
>
> I have a question regarding the quest given by Sylia Windlehands -- how
> many times can you do it? Every time I talk to her (hoping to get another
> quest) she asks me for the spiderling silks. Having done this quest 3 or
> 4
> times, I can only ask -- how many lutes do they have there that need
> strings?
>
> Are there other quests in Kelethin that a bard can do, aside from offering
> to locate people's corpses for them?
>
> Kendrin
> (Tunare)
>
